name: Nix (Slagathor-ld)
description:
As an orb seeker, you live for the thrill of collecting those sweet, sweet orbs.

All orbs protect you from your enemies. Get hit without any orbs and...well you can guess what happens next.

W, A, S, D keys to move around

Pink Orbs let you demolish surrounding enemies. (hold spacebar)

Green Orbs let you move fast while shielding you. (right-mouse button)

Blue Orbs let you shoot enemies. (left-mouse button)

You start with NOTHING, how long can you survive?
